projects.heading: To Do List
projects.name: To Do List | JavaFX
des: • ToDoList is a desktop Software with a GUI, used to make notes and keep a track of deadlines of various work lists.
• This application is developed in JavaFX.
• The user can add, delete and check tasks for the day

projects.heading: CLASH & RC
projects.name: CLASH RC | Django
des: • Working on Backend part of the website, by Django's framework.
• Using Sandboxing to run C/CPP code in backend.

projects.heading: NCC
projects.name: NCC | REST APIs
des: • Working in backend part of the website, implementing backend logic.
• Creating Rest APIs from where the data is fetched.
• Implementing sandboxing for running c/cpp code in backend.
• Deploying whole application on the internet.

experience.des: Worked on a website and software which automates the manual process of downloading data from the sources by using APIs and display it over the website, Created a static website(frontend using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript) and GUI of software using Python's library tinkter.
Wrote a textbook in R language and successfully submitted it to IITB.
